item.title: Infinity Nikki: How To Get Vine of Dream (Sovereign of Sexy Medal)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Get Vine of Dream In Infinity Nikki
  • How To Get Sovereign of Sexy Medal In Infinity Nikki
  • How To Beat Sovereign Of Sexy In Infinity Nikki

Many of the Sovereigns in Infinity Nikki have a mysterious identity, like the Banshee, who's currently holding the Sovereign of Elegant Medal in Wishfield.

Likewise, when players attempt to challenge the Sovereign of Sexy to earn the Sovereign of Sexy Medal, they'll find themselves posing in front of a Barrel Home with no Sovereign in sight. Later, after obtaining the Perfect score, Stylists will finally find the truth behind the Sovereign of Sexy in Infinity Nikki . Thankfully, getting the Vine of Dream is easier than uncovering the truth about the Sovereign.

How To Get Vine of Dream In Infinity Nikki

To get the Vine of Dream in Infinity Nikki , players must gain a Normal or better rank in a styling challenge against the Sovereign of Sexy.

What Is Vine of Dream For?

Vine of Dream is utilized to make the Aurosa Traces socks from the Wishful Aurosa outfit. Players have to prepare these items to craft the socks:

  • Vine of Dream x1
  • Bedrock Crystal: Command x10
  • Handkerfin x5 kg
  • Kerchief Fish x5 kg
  • Cushion Fluff x3
  • Thread of Purity x96
  • Bling x7500

How To Get Sovereign of Sexy Medal In Infinity Nikki

To meet the Sovereign of Sexy and get the Sovereign of Sexy Medal in Infinity Nikki , start from the very first faction, which is the Raging Rocks. After defeating the leader, players will get the clue to meet the first member of the Rustic Frenzy. Complete all the challenges from this group to unlock the Shifty Rags.

Some of the Shifty Rags members only come out at night.

After defeating all the members from the three factions, players must pass Chali and Pomey's test before they have the chance to challenge the Sovereign of Sexy.

How To Beat Sovereign Of Sexy In Infinity Nikki

Sovereign of Sexy in Infinity Nikki has the following theme for the styling challenge: Sexy, Romance . Around 30k must be achieved to get the Normal rank, whereas the Perfect rating demands around 58k points.

Sovereign Of Sexy Duel Rewards

Rating

Reward

Normal

Sovereign of Sexy Medal: Wishfield

Average

Thread of Purity x100

Great

Diamonds x30

Perfect

Resonite Crystal x1

If players' score is too low, then they can increase the level of their outfits by going to the Glow Up menu in their Pear-Pal. Additionally, Stylists can also level up their Eureka to get more points. The following Eurekas are ranked best to worst in their Sexy ratings:

  • 4-star Heart Kiss (S-Rank)
  • 5-star Afterglow (B-Rank)
  • 4-star Masked Magic (B-Rank)
  • 5-star First Snow (C-Rank)

The final point is determined by the score of the outfits. This means players should use the clothing piece with the highest score, regardless of whether the piece matches with each other .

These outfit sets have the Sexy tags for this challenge:

  • Flutter Storm (Limited Banner)
  • Whisper of Waves (Standard Banner)
  • Dreamy Glimmer (Limited Banner)
  • Starwish Echoes (Kilo the Cadenceborn)

For F2P players, they can craft the following individual rare pieces to help with their score:

  • Twilight Hour Bottoms (Heart of Infinity)
  • Hexbreaker Bracelet (Heart of Infinity)
  • Violet Phantom Choker (Heart of Infinity)
  • Batwing Pulse Earrings (Heart of Infinity)

item.title: Wuthering Waves: Thessaleo Fells Overflowing Palette Locations & Solutions
item.description:
The Overflowing Palette is described in Wuthering Waves as broken morph paintings that drain the energy from their surroundings to maintain their form by taking the life and color out of surrounding plants and animals.

Solving each Overflowing Palette puzzle will reward players with 20 Resonate Calcite, 15 Astrite, 25 Union EXP, 5,000 Shell Credit, and upgrading materials in Wuthering Waves . The Resonate Calcite can be used as an exchange currency at Stillwind Grocery in Egla City for various valuable items.

Thessaleo Fells Overflowing Palette Locations & Solutions In Wuthering Waves

Thessaleo Fells Overflowing Palette Location #1

The first Thessaleo Fells Overflowing Palette in Wuthering Waves is south of Rinascita-Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells northern Resonance Beacon, inside a building. To reach it, teleport to the waypoint, jump down south to the ground level, then turn north and go inside the building. To solve it and turn all the blocks blue , players should:

  • Pick the red color, then dye the four blue blocks in the middle.
  • Select the yellow color, then dye the red blocks.
  • Pick the blue color, then paint all the yellow squares.

Thessaleo Fells Overflowing Palette Location #2

From the previous location, head south to locate the second Overflowing Palette puzzle in Wuthering Waves . Solving the puzzle requires players to turn all the blocks blue in 4 steps only . To achieve this, follow these steps:

  • Choose the yellow color, then dye all the green blocks.
  • Pick the red dye and paint yellow squares.
  • Choose the blue paint and dye the red blocks.

Thessaleo Fells Overflowing Palette Location #3

The third Overflowing Palette puzzle in Thessaleo Fells is west of Porto-Veno Castle. To reach it, teleport to the Waypoint by the Castle, then go south. Next, interact with the puzzle and turn all of its blocks yellow by doing the following:

  • Pick the blue dye and paint the red blocks to the right.
  • Choose the red paint, then dye all the blue squares.
  • Select the yellow color, then paint all the red blocks.

Thessaleo Fells Overflowing Palette Location #4

Teleport back to the Resonance Beacon west of Porto-Veno Castle, but this time head up the northwestern hill to locate the fourth Overflowing Palette. This puzzle will ask players to turn all the blocks red in 3 steps . To do so, simply do the following:

  • Choose the blue color, then paint the yellow squares.
  • Dye the green blocks with the blue color.
  • Select the red dye and paint all the blue blocks with it.

Thessaleo Fells Overflowing Palette Location #5

The fifth Overflowing Palette puzzle in Wuthering Waves is north of Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells-Twin Peaks' northern Resonance Beacon. Fast travel to the waypoint, glide from the northern edge, then interact with the painting. To solve it in three steps and turn all the blocks yellow, players must:

  • Pick the green color, then dye the blue blocks.
  • Select the red dye and color the green squares.
  • Choose the yellow paint and dye all the red blocks yellow.

item.title: Wuthering Waves - Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Locations
item.description:
Sonance Casket: Ragunna is a Wuthering Waves material that can be collected from Rinascita. The precious item is believed to hold untwisted memories of the past. The Sonance Casket: Ragunna is scattered around precious locations in Rinascita and can be easily collected by the Grapple Utility.

Rovers can exchange the Sonance Casket: Ragunna at the Tweensy Weensy merchant in the Garden of the Lost for precious items like Astrite, Casket Sonnar Use Permit: Rinascita, Resonance Potions, Energy Cores, Plushie Village Restoration Log, and Shell Credits in Wuthering Waves .

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Locations In Wuthering Waves

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #1

The first Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna in Wuthering Waves is northeast of the Rinascita-Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells Resonance Nexus.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #2

To collect the second Sonance Casket: Ragunna in Thessaleo Fells, Rovers need to:

  • Teleport to Rinascita-Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells northern Resonance Beacon.
  • Move west toward the Dream Patrol: Sprawling Scarlet challenge.
  • Climb the wall to the top.
  • Jump to collect the Sonance Casket: Ragunna.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #3

From the previous location in Wuthering Waves , use the Wingray to fly toward the Resounding Rise Tower top to collect the next Sonance Casket: Ragunna.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #4

Use the flying ability in Wuthering Waves to reach the Twilight Rise Tower from the Resounding Rise Tower. The fourth Sonance Casket: Ragunna will be floating above it.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #5

Fly from the Twilight Rise Tower toward the Command Rise Tower bridge to claim another Sonance Casket: Ragunna in Wuthering Waves .

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #6-7

The next Sonance Casket: Ragunna, will be inside the Command Rise Tower. Rovers can only claim them during or after the Shadow of the Towers: Command Rise Sub-Quest.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #8

After completing the previous Shadow of the Towers: Command Rise Quest in Wuthering Waves , players will emerge at the top of the Command Rise Tower. Use the opportunity to fly down toward the next Sonance Casket: Ragunna or just climb the Tower normally from the ground.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #9

Teleport to the Twin Peaks southern Resonance Beacon to grab the ninth Sonance Casket: Ragunna in Wuthering Waves .

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #10

Next, go toward the bridge and leap off, then fly under it to collect another Sonance Casket: Ragunna in Thessaleo Fells.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #11

The next Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna is west of the Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells-Twin Peaks northern Resonance Beacon.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #12

From the previous location in Wuthering Waves , move southwest and leap off the cliff to the ground, then move toward the golden-winged horse statue. On top of it, Rovers can find the twelfth Sonance Casket: Ragunna in Thessaleo Fells.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #13

Fast travel to Porto-Veno Castle to collect the Sonance Casket: Ragunna on top of it. Use the Grapple Utility to reach it or climb the Castle normally.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #14

Go toward the Resonance Beacon west of the Porto-Veno Castle, then move northwest to find another Sonance Casket: Ragunna under the Dream Patrol: Auto Handpuppet challenge in Wuthering Waves .

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #15

Teleport to Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells-Garden of the Lost Resonance Beacon and claim the Sonance Casket: Ragunna above the Teensy Weensy Plushie merchant.

Thessaleo Fells Sonance Casket: Ragunna Location #16

The last Sonance Casket: Ragunna in Thessaleo Fells is southeast of the Twin Peaks northern waypoint. To collect it, teleport to the Resonance Beacon, leap off the southeastern cliff, then glide toward the broken bridge.

item.title: Wuthering Waves: Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Locations
item.description:
Thessaleo Fells has many secrets to uncover in Wuthering Waves , from the Thorncrown Rises Towers, the Overflowing Palette puzzles, Dream Patrol, the Three Fratellis' Challenges, to the Treasure Spots.

Each claimed chest offers Rovers a set number of Moannie in Wuthering Waves . The obtained currency can be exchanged at the Averardo Bank Counter in Ragunna City for precious materials like Astrite and upgrading materials. A gift icon on the map marks the Bank, so players can easily spot it.

Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Locations In Wuthering Waves

Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Location #1

The first Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot is north of Rinascita-Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells Resonance Nexus. To collect all the four chests within the designated range, players need to:

  • Teleport to Rinascita-Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells Resonance Nexus.
  • Move north toward the stairs, then climb them.
  • Defeat the Plushies Echoes lurking in the area.
  • Claim the first Basic Supply chest from behind a chair.
  • Move east toward the crates to claim the next Basic Supply chest.
  • Go inside the tent south of the previous location in Wuthering Waves .
  • Collect the Advanced chest.
  • Head west to locate the last Standard chest.

Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Location #2

Teleport to Twin Peaks northern Resonance Beacon, then move to the northwestern Plushies camp to locate the next Treasure Spot in Wuthering Waves . Upon arriving, defeat the Echoes and claim the four Supply chests within the area.

Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Location #3

The third Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot is south of Rinascita-Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells' northern Resonance Beacon. To reach the location and find all three Supply chests , do the following:

  • Fast travel to Rinascita-Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells' northern Resonance Beacon.
  • Jump south toward the opening on the roof.
  • Defeat the Plushies Echoes in Wuthering Waves .
  • Collect the Standard Supply chest under the wooden ramp.
  • Head southeast to get to the next Advanced chest.
  • Turn west to get the last Basic Supply chest.

Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Location #4

From the previous location in Wuthering Waves , move southeast to find the fourth Treasure Spot. Inside the designated building, Rovers will have to defeat the Echoes to claim all four Supply chests .

Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Location #5

Next, head northeast to locate the next Treasure Spot. It has three chests that can be claimed after defeating the lurking Echoes.

Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Location #6

The sixth Treasure Spot is under the Twin Peaks bridge. To find all four Supply chests within its range, players need to defeat the Plushies within the specified range.

Thessaleo Fells Treasure Spot Chest Location #7

At the Porto-Veno Castle, there is a Treasure Spot where players need to find 6 Supply chests in Wuthering Waves . To locate them all, follow these steps:

  • Teleport to the Resonance Beacon west of the Porto-Veno Castle.
  • Go towards the Castle.
  • Claim the Basic Supply chest next to the fishing guy.
  • Climb the northern column to collect the next chest.
  • Glide west to get the third Supply chest from behind the painting guy.
  • Move behind the Porto-Veno Castle.
  • Collect the chest by the water.
  • Climb the Castle to the top with the Sonance Casket: Ragunna in Wuthering Waves .
  • Claim the Advanced Supply chest.
  • Go to the western roof to claim the last Supply chest in Thessaleo Fells.

item.title: Wuthering Waves: Thorncrown Rises Three Towers Locations (Shadows of the Past Quest)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Thorncrown Rises Three Towers Locations In Wuthering Waves
  • Shadow of the Towers: Resounding Rise
  • Shadow of the Towers: Twilight Rise
  • Shadow of the Towers: Command Rise

As players explore Thorncrown Rises in Wuthering Waves , they will come across Botim, standing south of the Rinascita-Ragunna-Thessaleo Fells northern Resonance Beacon. He will explain to Rovers how his family entrusted him with managing an ancestral site, where a handed-down "Terminal" still exists.

He further explains how the towers are infested with shadowy monsters that emerge from within, causing chaos before disappearing on their own. He then offers players valuable rewards for handling this task in his stead. This will initiate the Shadow of the Past Quest in Wuthering Waves .

Thorncrown Rises Three Towers Locations In Wuthering Waves

There are three towers to locate in Thorncrown Rises and each of them will complete part of the Shadow of the Past Quest, which breaks into three sub-Quests:

  • Shadow of the Towers: Resounding Rise : The northeastern Tower of Thorncrown Rises.
  • Shadow of the Towers: Twilight Rise : The southern Tower of Thorncrown Rises.
  • Shadow of the Towers: Command Rise : The southwestern Tower of Thorncrown Rises.

Shadow of the Towers: Resounding Rise

The Resounding Rise Tower is located northeast of Thorncrown Rises. To enter it and start the Shadow of the Towers: Resounding Rise sub-Quest, talk to Itzel, standing east of the Tower. Next, players need to explore the Tower by doing the following:

  • Touch the painting at the end of the hallway to enter it.
  • Follow the Quest marker to follow the Abyssal Mercator.
  • Defeat it, then claim the northern Basic Supply chest in Wuthering Waves .
  • Head to the western room to claim another Supply chest.
  • Move to the eastern room, then enter the second painting.
  • Face off the Abyssal Mercator again.
  • Defeat the enemies in the eastern and western rooms to claim the Supply chests.
  • Head north, then follow the Quest marker to pursue the Abyssal Mercator.
  • Defeat it once more.
  • Touch the painting behind it to follow it.
  • Open the chest at the end of the hallway to stop the shooting enemies.
  • Face off the Wuthering Waves enemy blocking the way.

Next, players need to arrange the paintings correctly to complete the Shadow of the Towers: Resounding Rise sub-Quest in Wuthering Waves . To do so, follow these steps:

  • Take the painting on the top left and place it on the bottom right display.
  • Hold the painting behind the top left display.
  • Put it on the bottom left display.
  • Grab the top right painting and place it on the top left display.
  • Get the painting behind the bottom right display.
  • Place it on the top right display.
  • Claim the Premium Supply chest.

Afterward, touch the painting and face off the Abyssal Mercator for the last time, then talk to Itzel and claim the Tidal Supply chest. Upon defeat, one of the Command Rise Tower barriers will weakened.

Shadow of the Towers: Twilight Rise

After exiting the previous Tower, head southeast toward the Twilight Rise Tower and talk to Insula to go inside. After entering the Tower, follow the Quest marker until Rovers realize they are stuck in a loop and Insula shows up, then:

  • Investigate the three marked spots to find clues.
  • Talk to Insula.
  • Enter the secret passageway under the elevator.
  • Defeat the Abyssal Patricius.
  • Take the Supply chest and follow it further.
  • Face it for the last time.
  • Talk to Insula again.
  • Collect the Tidal Supply chest in Wuthering Waves .

These steps will complete the Shadow of the Towers: Twilight Rise Quest and weaken the second Command Rise Tower barrier.

Shadow of the Towers: Command Rise

Completing the first two parts of the Shadow of the Past Quest will automatically trigger the Shadow of the Past: Command Rise Tower sub-Quest in Wuthering Waves . During the mission, players need to:

  • Head to the camp northeast of Command Rise Tower to talk to Insula and Itzel.
  • Use the Wingray northwest of the beach to fly toward the Command Rise Tower.
  • Enter the Tower.
  • Follow the Quests mark to go deeper into the Command Rise Tower.
  • Collect the Supply chest west of the moving libraries.
  • Use the Grapple to climb up.
  • Take the Basic Supply from between the jars, then defeat the enemies on the other side of the balcony to get another Supply chest.
  • Move to Quests marker to face off the Abyssal Patricius.
  • Get the chest, then use the Grapple to climb further.

From here forward, Rovers need to use the Grapple to pull out more libraries and use them to reach higher ground in the Tower . However, as you go up, explore every nook and cranny, as the Command Rise Tower has many Supply chests scattered around the different levels. Also, players will find two Sonance Caskets: Ragunna inside the Tower.

Afterward, use the chandeliers mechanics to reach the very top of the tower. Upon arriving, Rovers will find Liel dead, so players can talk to Insula and Itzel, then use the portal behind them to reach the Abyssal Patricius location in Wuthering Waves . Defeat it to claim the Call of the Abyss Rectifier and a Premium Supply chest.

Leaving the Command Rise Tower through the portal and talking to the two companions will reward players with the King of Thessaleo Achievement and the Shadow of the Tower Achievement in Wuthering Waves .
